parquet.pig

Class ParquetLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.LoadFunc
      • parquet.pig.ParquetLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.pig.LoadMetadata, org.apache.pig.LoadPushDown

    public class ParquetLoader
extends org.apache.pig.LoadFunc
implements org.apache.pig.LoadMetadata, org.apache.pig.LoadPushDown
    A Pig Loader for the Parquet file format.
    Author:
    Julien Le Dem
